channel.title: How to put my server on?
channel.description:
Okay I'm using a VPS I recently shut a server down the programs it had running was the sourse obviously, some XAMPP program, and another one called RS2 client which showed who was online.
After I closed these down I went on TeamViewer and somebody else put another client up I'm not sure if they changed any ips. But I know that if I run that source, that server will be up.
I need some help in getting the older server up please. I have the source and the XAMPP program, I can't find that RS2 client (not sure if I need it).
All help if appreciated, Thanks.

item.title: How to put my server on?
item.dc:creator: @P_o_s_t_m_a_n P o s t m a n
